findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: add(uint256 _allocPoint, …), set(uint256 _pid, …), updateGsysRate(), burnGsys() and updateEmissionRate() could invoke massUpdatePools() function, that can fail due to block gas limit if the pool size is too big.
findings.function: add(uint256 _allocPoint, …), set(uint256 _pid, …), updateGsysRate(), burnGsys() and updateEmissionRate()

findings.title: add() function issue
findings.description: nonDuplicated modifier will work for all lp tokens except _gsys because there is no adding it in contract constructor.

findings.title: Owner privileges (In the period when the owner is not renounced)
findings.description: The contract owner has excessive privileges to modify critical parameters and perform sensitive actions across multiple contracts.
